value:
Blues skies, blue seas. Me? I like
both as long as I'm feeling free.

We're not like Naesala and those
folks from Kilvas. That lot's nothing
more than a bunch of pillagers.

We're not your typical pirates who
pillage anybody. Our cause is revenge
against the humans of Begnion.

I love a good breeze, be it off the
sea or when I'm soaring among the
clouds.$k$pSay, ever been rocked to sleep on a
boat? You should try it.

This pirate diet of salted meat and
biscuits is great! It's exactly the kind
of food hawks like me eat back home.

I'm Tibarn. Just in from a festival
at $Nf's castle!

Flawless victory! Now, let's hear
a war cry!
You won't get away so easily.

Red sky at morning, sailors take
warning... Must be why I'm feeling
apprehensive right now.
I'm honored! I won't let you down!

I'm King Tibarn of Phoenicis.
A pirate...festival? Beorc sure
do have a lot of strange holidays.

Those Begnion ruffians call US
pirates but it's they who are the
real thieves!$k$pThey killed innocent herons and
burned down forests... And so we'll
have our revenge as "pirates."$k$pBut don't think I'm not enjoying
myself at this quaint festival. Even
while donning these clothes...$k$pDifferent kinds of beorc exist. Not all
of 'em think the same. In times like
these I can surely recognize that.$k$pI wonder how this festival compares
to others. I hope you will show me all
of them, $Nu.
おらっ！
いくぜ！
うああっ！
ちぃっ！
Time to pillage!
Villainous scum!
You're through!
You'll regret this!
A bad joke...
Huh...
Call me Tibarn. I've been told Beorc pirates wear this kind of outfit...
Huh? Oh, you'd like to don pirate garb, too. Is that it?
Aye, the "Shipless Pirates" was my crew. Everyone knew us but it was Begnion who truly feared us.
Those landbound Beorc can't cross the ocean except by ship… What a shame.
Understand this: we've got our reasons for what we do, but rampant plunder isn't one of 'em.
Nobody crosses my waters without my say-so.
Festivals are lively, aren't they? I think I'll enjoy myself a little longer.
Aye.
Need somethin'?
Where's the loot?
